Articles.Content:
Lemme know what you think! This is a tutorial on how to get to the moon.

My body is ready for all your criticism so please don't hold back! And before you say it yes I know the quality of the video sucks I'm working on rendering and compressing my videos better

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cbLTK8ergpE

Bump - I dont know why the quality is so bad I used fraps to record and Sony Vegas to render the video. It looked pretty decent until I threw it up on youtube. ;(

Anyone know the cause?
